alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 5:47PM EDT until June 04 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Miami-Dade County in southeastern Florida... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 547 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Royal Palm Ranger, or 10 miles south of Homestead General Airport, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Homestead, Florida City and Royal Palm Ranger. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A short-lived tornado is possible within this storm.
